summary: Myspace is a U.S. social networking site started in 2003. It was the first social network to be popular worldwide and influenced technology and culture. At its peak in 2008, it had 115 million visitors monthly. Myspace was bought and sold several times, first for $580 million and finally for $87 million in 2016. It was very popular until Facebook surpassed it in 2009. Today, only about seven million people visit Myspace each month.
title: Myspace
